display.title: Setting Up A Wax Refinery
display.description: A Wax Refinery Structure Kit can be made by dropping a Stone Saw & Hammer, Brewing Stand, Lightning Rod, Lodestone & Campfire onto a Fletching Table [Required: 1x Stone Saw & Hammer 1x Brewing Stand 1x Lightning Rod 1x Lodestone 1x Campfire | Drop Craft With: Fletching Table]
